content: *or ex-girlfriends old flames former lovers we collect yarn ends like stories of past paramours this triangular-shaped shawl will let you use up those leftover ends to create one great story also it tickles me to think of having random ex-boyfriends laying around the house aspiring to be useful in a knitting project * size can easily be modified by adding or subtracting section repeats as shown 36 cm / 14 deep x 208 cm / 82 wide at largest points using needles with fine points will make the kfb s and k2tog s much easier - addi turbo lace needles are a great choice
